title: Square Sans in NYT Mag
content:
This has been bugging me over the past couple days as I’ve been reading the latest NYT Sunday Magazine- looks like Unit or Taz, but it’s neither. Can anyone ID this?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709015852im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/NYT001_3773.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709015852im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/NYT002_5943.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709015852im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/NYT003_6584.jpg)

 [‹ aquarium logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709015852/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44527 "Go to previous forum topic") [Font ID Please ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709015852/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44495 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dejongal

comments.content:
is it Fedra Sans and Fedra Sans Display?

[http://www.typotheque.com/fonts/fedra\_sans/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709015852/http:/www.typotheque.com/fonts/fedra_sans/ "http://www.typotheque.com/fonts/fedra\_sans/")  
 [http://www.typotheque.com/fedra\_sans\_display](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709015852/http:/www.typotheque.com/fedra_sans_display "http://www.typotheque.com/fedra\_sans\_display")
Nope. Look at the scans— the ’a’ is different.

It’s Sunday by Eric Olson, Process Type Foundry.

[http://www.processtypefoundry.com/custom/sunday.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709015852/http:/www.processtypefoundry.com/custom/sunday.html "http://www.processtypefoundry.com/custom/sunday.html")

[Custom](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709015852/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42957).

EDIT: More info [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709015852/http:/processtypefoundry.com/custom/sunday.html).

EDIT2: My, weren’t we all eager to help today?
HAHAHA, yes. I guess I typed too slow.

Most (if not all) of the NYT fonts are custom.

Happy Earth Day.
